about_the_game:
[Background Introduction]
This is a tale of Zhao Yun, who devours heaven and earth. It adopts a turn based combat style and tells the entire process from Zhao Yun's birth to his appointment as a General of the Five Tigers from another perspective. There are also many historical events involved
Famous generals all appeared, together performing on this grand stage of the Three Kingdoms world.
【 Developer's Words 】
The author lived in rural areas in northern China when he was a child, and many games became popular very late. It was only from sixth grade to junior high school that there were red and white machines and card games available here. At that time, I would go to my younger brother's house every day to watch him fight "Devouring Heaven and Earth" and the Second Robot War (the cassette tape still mentioned the Gulf War). During this time, I particularly enjoyed Devouring Heaven and Earth. At that time, I stood behind him, watched him play, and gave him advice, jokingly calling me the "dog headed strategist".
But the biggest difference between him and me is that he likes Guan Yu, I like Zhao Yun, and he even takes the initiative to put Zhao Yun in the editorial office, abandoning him and using Guan Yu to lead the team. (I'm only a few months older than him, maybe I want to use this to resist me haha)
I always say a lot of words to make him use Zhao Yun, but now it's been 20 years and I still miss that wonderful time.
For this reason, I made this game for Zhao Yun and Swallowing Heaven and Earth, whom I loved in my childhood. Unfortunately, my younger brother did not show any interest in making games when he grew up, so Guan Yu's biography should only be in his dreams, hahaha

[Game Features]
Entering the Three Kingdoms period
1. Historical generals flock here in droves
2. Many girls like the protagonist
3. Also known as: Zhao Yun's harem biography
4. The equipment system is very distinctive, with multiple entries, soul inlays, and free combinations.
5. Powerful generals will be blessed with their own destiny: extreme departure from the Ming Dynasty, sun and moon in the same palace, and the Three Wonders and Jia Hui, among others
6. I hope everyone can rediscover the joy of childhood with Zhao Yun
If you like this work, you can join the group to communicate with me, and also welcome to follow the producer's social media account, although there is not much content (* ^ ▽ ^ *)
You can search for the same name work on Taptap or join the group below when playing on the mobile app
TAPTAP: Qingyi Studio
Bilibili: Qingyi Black
Steam exclusive communication group: 289445576

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows8/10/11
  • Processor: any type
  • Graphics: any type
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: you must have one
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Swallowing the Heaven and Earth Version of Zhao Yun's Biography, in which multiple girls fall in love with you, also known as: Zhao Yun's Harem Biography
